Career Opportunity.desc: The City of Barberton is seeking a qualified candidate to fill the Stormwater Manager position.

<i class='icon-leaf'></i> Farmers Market.desc: There will be a farmers market in downtown on Wednesday from 2 to 6. Fresh produce from local vendors, baked goods, jams, jellies, honey, syrup, flowers, health information & screening, cooking & vegetable carving demonstrations, gardening tips, kid's day, free market bag & shopper incentives. Fun for the whole family!

Change for Change.desc:
This month's Change for Change funds will be donated to: Barberton Athletic Department
June 28, 4:30-7:00 at Fairways (451 Fairview Ave, Barberton, OH)

City Offices Closed.desc: City offices will be closed July 4th in observance of Independence Day.

Concert: Terry Lee Goffee.desc: Johnny Cash style performer Terry Lee Goffee will be performing at the Lake Anna Park Gazebo Friday, July 12 at 7:30PM

Cruisin' Into Downtown.desc:
Classic vehicle display, music, great food, shopping, contests, and loads of fun! Sponsored by NDS.
When: June 6 5-8pm
Where: 2nd St NW
